name: REROLL (GMTK2022 JAM)
description:
Move with the mouse and dodge the traps!

I unfortunately didn't notice the Jam started untill after 24 hours so I didn't have time to add the actual functionality of the game :')

it was supposed to reroll which traps were on each of the sides of the dice every time you level up and get progressively harder.

Will probably finish this later on with all intended features

Also, the shaders broke when exporting :'))
